text: Richard Henry "Peter" Sellers (8 September 1925 â€“ 24 July 1980) was an EnglishPeter Sellers - Britannica Online Encyclopedia actor and comedian best known for his three roles in Dr. Strangelove,as Aldo Vanucci in "After The Fox"; as "Inspector Clouseau" in The Pink Panther movies, and as Clare Quilty in the original 1962 screen version of Lolita. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:1980 deaths Category:Actors from Hampshire Category:British radio actors Category:Comedians from Hampshire Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:People from Portsmouth Category:Commanders of the Order of the British Empire
title: Peter Sellers
